name: cbvsbcv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s1, c0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s1, c0, w1))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s1, c0, w1))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

|- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s1, c0, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

|- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s1, c0, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: Change the bound variable of a class substitution using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 30-Sep-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2016.)
